summary: Conversion of the .swf files to .fla files to allow modification of Skyrim UI.
descriptionHtml:
This is a complete conversion of the various .swf files in the Skyrim - Interface.bsa to their editable .fla counterpart.

You will need a proper flash editor with the Scaleform SDK to make use of those.

As far as we know, Skyrim use Flash 10 and ActionScript 2.0 as in the [url=http://gameware.autodesk.com/scaleform/support/documentation]UDK 3.3.89 you can find here[/url].

You will be missing the fonts for most of the fla. I unpacked the fonts a the resources they are so there is a folder with all of them with each graphic of each letter used. I don\'t know precisely how this help but this is the best I can do. Maybe someone can make a proper font set from that.

I also added the GFX files [url=http://www.modsrus.com/wiki/doku.php?id=dow2:formats:gfx]using this method[/url] converted to FLA in a separate archive. They are the HUD, the quest journal, the chargen and so on.

Good modding!

Note: the version number reflect the version of the game the .swf have been extracted from.
author: Ismelda
